REMOTE 1
========
            --------------|------------|-----------|-----------------|------------
              ++ chid  +    rid    ++    ++++++++    + action +++++     chk   +++
CH1 STOP:     10 11010 1    010110 01    10011010    0 01     00000     01000 101
CH1 UP:       10 11010 1    010110 01    10011010    0 10     00000     00000 101
CH1 DOWN:     10 11010 1    010110 01    10011010    0 11     00000     00100 101

CH2 STOP:     10 00010 1    010110 01    10011010    0 01     00000     00100 101

CH3 STOP:     10 00110 1    010110 01    10011010    0 01     00000     01100 101
CH3 UP:       10 00110 1    010110 01    10011010    0 10     00000     00100 101

CH4 STOP      10 00110 1    010110 01    10011010    0 01     00000     00010 101
CH4 UP:       10 00110 1    010110 01    10011010    0 10     00000     01100 101
CH4 DOWN:     10 00110 1    010110 01    10011010    0 11     00000     01010 101

CH5 STOP:     10 10110 1    010110 01    10011010    0 01     00000     01010 101
CH5 UP:       10 10110 1    010110 01    10011010    0 10     00000     00010 101
CH5 DOWN:     10 10110 1    010110 01    10011010    0 11     00000     00110 101
CH5 PAIRING:  10 10110 1    010110 01    10011010    0 00     00000     11100 101

DOWNSTAIRS
==========
CH1 STOP:     10 01110 1    100001 01    10011010    0 01     00000     01101 101
CH1 UP:       10 01110 1    100001 01    10011010    0 10     00000     00101 101
CH1 DOWN:     10 01110 1    100001 01    10011010    0 11     00000     00011 101
CH1 PAIR:     10 01110 1    100001 01    10011010    0 00     00000     11001 101

CH2 STOP:     10 11110 1    100001 01    10011010    0 01     00000     00011 101
CH2 UP:       10 11110 1    100001 01    10011010    0 10     00000     01101 101
CH2 DOWN:     10 11110 1    100001 01    10011010    0 11     00000     01011 101

CH3 STOP:     10 10000 1    100001 01    10011010    0 01     00000     01011 101

              11 10001 0    010001 00    10001000    0 00     00011     11100 011 down


rid =       Remote ID: Remote specific - changes across remotes.
action =    Action:    Action to perform
                + 00: PAIR
                + 01: STOP
                + 10: UP
                + 11: DOWN

chk =       Checksum: Appears to change across all different actions
                      on the same channel.
chid =      Chanel ID: Constant across same actions on the same channel.


CH1 UP:     00110101 01011001 10011010 01000000 00000101
CH1 DOWN:   00110101 01011001 10011010 01100000 00100101
CH1 STOP:   00110101 01011001 10011010 00100000 01000101
CH1 PAIR:   00110101 01011001 10011010 00000000 11111001
CH1 LEFT:   00110101 01011001 10011010 01100010 00100111
CH1 RIGHT:  00110101 01011001 10011010 00010010 01100111

CH2 STOP:   00000101 01011001 10011010 00100000 00100101
CH2 UP:     00000101 01011001 10011010 01000000 01000101
CH2 DOWN:   00000101 01011001 10011010 01100000 01100101
CH2 PAIR:   00000101 01011001 10011010 00000000 10000101
CH2 LEFT:   00000101 01011001 10011010 01100010 01100111
CH2 RIGHT:  00000101 01011001 10011010 00010010 00010111


CH5 UP:     00101101 01011001 10011010 01000000 00010101
CH5 DOWN:   00101101 01011001 10011010 01100000 00110101
CH5 STOP:   00101101 01011001 10011010 00100000 01010101
CH5 PAIR:   00101101 01011001 10011010 00000000 11100101
CH5 LEFT:   00101101 01011001 10011010 01100010 00110111
CH5 RIGHT:  00101101 01011001 10011010 00010010 01110111


CH3 UP:     00001101 01011001 10011010          01000000 00100101
CH3 DOWN:   00001101 01011001 10011010          01100000 00010101
CH3 STOP:   00001101 01011001 10011010          00100000 01100101
CH3 PAIR:   00001101 01011001 10011010          00000000 11000101
CH3 LEFT:   00001101 01011001 10011010          01100010 00010111
CH3 RIGHT:  00001101 01011001 10011010          00010010 01010111

CH4 UP:     00001101 01011001 10011010          01000000 01100101  ->
CH4 DOWN:   00001101 01011001 10011010          01100000 01010101  ->
CH4 STOP:   00001101 01011001 10011010          00100000 00010101  ->
CH4 PAIR:   00001101 01011001 10011010          00000000 10100101  -> 10100101
CH4 LEFT:   00001101 01011001 10011010          01100010 01010111  -> 00110101
CH4 RIGHT:  00001101 01011001 10011010          00010010 00110111  -> 00100101

CH6 UP:     00001101 01011001 10011010          01000000 01010101  -> 00010101
CH6 DOWN:   00001101 01011001 10011010          01100000 01110101  -> 00010101
CH6 STOP:   00001101 01011001 10011010          00100000 00110101  -> 00010101
CH6 PAIR:   00001101 01011001 10011010          00000000 10010101  -> 10010101
CH6 LEFT:   00001101 01011001 10011010          01100010 01110111  -> 00010101
CH6 RIGHT:  00001101 01011001 10011010          00010010 00001111  -> 00011101


Home Remote

CH1 UP:     00011101 10000101 10011010 01000000 00101101
CH1 DOWN:   00011101 10000101 10011010 01100000 00011101
CH1 STOP:   00011101 10000101 10011010 00100000 01101101
CH1 PAIR:   00011101 10000101 10011010 00000000 11001101
CH1 LEFT:   00011101 10000101 10011010 01100010 00011111
CH1 RIGHT:  00011101 10000101 10011010 00010010 01011111

CH2 RIGHT:  00111101 10000101 10011010 00010010 00111111

CH3 RIGHT:  00000001 10000101 10011010 00010010 01111111

CH4 DOWN:   00000011 10000101 10011010 01100000 01111101
CH4 STOP:   00000011 10000101 10011010 00100000 00111101
CH4 PAIR:   00000011 10000101 10011010 00000000 10011101
CH4 LEFT:   00000011 10000101 10011010 01100010 01111111
CH4 RIGHT:  00000011 10000101 10011010 00010010 00000000

CH5 DOWN:   00000011 10000101 10011010 01100000 00000011

CH5 RIGHT:  00000011 10000101 10011010 00010010 01000000

4 Way Remote

CH1 UP:     00000101 00101101 11101010 01000000 011 10 101
CH1 DOWN:   00000101 00101101 11101010 01100000 010 01 101
CH1 STOP:   00000101 00101101 11101010 00100000 000 01 101
CH1 PAIR:   00000101 00101101 11101010 00000000 101 10 101

CH2 UP:     00000101 00101101 11101010 01000000 001 10 101
CH2 DOWN:   00000101 00101101 11101010 01100000 000 01 101
CH2 STOP:   00000101 00101101 11101010 00100000 011 10 101
CH2 PAIR:   00000101 00101101 11101010 00000000 110 10 101

CH3 UP:     00000001 00101101 11101010 01000000 010 10 101
CH3 DOWN:   00000001 00101101 11101010 01100000 011 10 101
CH3 STOP:   00000001 00101101 11101010 00100000 001 10 101
CH3 PAIR:   00000001 00101101 11101010 00000000 100 10 101

CH4 UP:     00111001 00101101 11101010 01000000 000 10 101
CH4 DOWN:   00111001 00101101 11101010 01100000 001 10 101
CH4 STOP:   00111001 00101101 11101010 00100000 010 10 101
CH4 PAIR:   00111001 00101101 11101010 00000000 111 00 101
